verbose_text: In addition, in vivo analysis of Rb phosphorylation on serine 780 revealed that mangiferin treatment greatly reduced the phosphorylation of Rb, suggesting that the enhanced Cdk4 activity resulted in decreased Rb activity (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Rb phosphorylation on serine 780 revealed that mangiferin treatment greatly reduced the phosphorylation of Rb, suggesting that the enhanced Cdk4 activity resulted in decreased Rb
